name: Character Stats Display
author: FF6 Editor Team
description: Display comprehensive character statistics including HP, MP, equipment, learned spells, and command assignments in a formatted view
longDescription: The Character Stats Display plugin provides a comprehensive, formatted view of all character information in one convenient display. Select any character from your save file and view their complete statistics including basic stats (level, experience), HP/MP with percentages, combat stats (Vigor, Stamina, Speed, Magic), all 6 equipment slots, learned spells with proficiency levels, and command assignments. Perfect for quickly reviewing character builds without navigating through multiple editor tabs. The plugin supports configurable display options for showing/hiding specific sections and sorting spells by proficiency.
